content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "yellow_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 18}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 50, "index": 24}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 54, "index": 32}, {"type": "hopper", "quantity": 38, "index": 33}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 43}]

thought: I need to craft prismarine_brick_stairs, which requires placing 3 prismarine_bricks in a line, and then placing 2 more prismarine_bricks above them. I have 6 prismarine_bricks at slot 36, so I will move one of them into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_stairs

Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1
